column5: I am in Bruce county and if any others are from the area I would  appreciate a pm re: Ice conditions on some North Bruce lakes. Thanks
I dont ice fish but a few of my buddies have been slaying the dink perch on the ice the past few days...
Ive been wondering the same thing! I'm guessing the ice on Arron is alright now after this cold week! Have you fished Cameron much?
Went to Arran this aft. Caugt some  small ones. Some slush on top but good ice underneath. Did not find the bite hot for us. PPl beside got a nice pike though.
Wondering if anyone has been on the Bruce County area lakes this week after the rain and mild spell. Ice conditions?
